title: The Golden Dagger
synopsis: A renowned antique collector is found dead in his locked study, a priceless golden dagger missing from its display. Was it a robbery gone wrong or something more sinister?
fullStory: Renowned collector Arthur Blackwood was found dead by his butler, Jeeves, this morning. The study door was locked from the inside. The only thing missing is the legendary 'Dagger of Antioch'. The window was slightly ajar, but the ground below is undisturbed. The police are baffled.

suspects.name: Jeeves the Butler
suspects.shortInfo: The loyal butler who discovered the body.

suspects.name: Isabella Rossi
suspects.shortInfo: A historian who claimed the dagger was her family's heirloom.

evidence.name: Muddy Footprint
evidence.description: A small, muddy footprint found near the slightly open window.

evidence.name: A Torn Piece of Fabric
evidence.description: A small piece of expensive-looking silk snagged on the window latch.

evidence.name: A note with a threat
evidence.description: Blackwood's desk, a note reading, 'Give back what is not yours, or you will pay the price.'
